Summary: Graduate Certificate in Specialized Predictive Modelling & Forecasting . students can build tools & develop advanced analytics capabilities . modules include predictive & prescriptive analytics, statistical & machine learning .

the course has been designed to equip students with an understanding of how to solve complex prediction problems beyond what can be done using preliminary methodologies . the course covers several diverse topics to handle real world problems which requires non- standard methods .

this course will provide attendees with a practical understanding of Product and Pricing Analytics . it will derive actionable insights for demand forecasting, commercial excellence and portfolio management .

this course will leverage the combined strengths of predictive and prescriptive techniques across disciplines . it will derive actionable insights for marketing/sales and operations integration for demand generation and management .
Assessment Component Weight Practice Module is submitted by every individual covering their role, contributions, learnings from the project and its journey .
Groups must demonstrate their ability to apply and practice the knowledge, techniques and skills they have learnt from all the modules . the recommended group size is Four or Five .

Graduate Certificate in Specialized Predictive Modelling & Forecasting . aims to equip students with the skills to learn and apply advanced analytics solutions . modules include: • Advanced time series analysis (beyond what was covered in the PA course) • Survival Analysis/Time to Event Modelling which has a wide application in banking, manufacturing, health industry, gaming industry .
